Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 11th overall pick, by San Francisco in 1980...
Injured on 4/9/1983 with a Strained Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1985, off Billy Farmer (CIN)...
Injured on 7/9/1985 with a Fractured Ulna, out for 5-6 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 8/18/1985, off Dennis Martinez (PIT)...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Los Angeles on 9/22/1986...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against St. Louis on 4/2/1987...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1987, hitting .395 with 5 HR, 22 RBI...
Injured on 6/3/1987 with a Fractured Ankle, out for 3 weeks...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1988, hitting .318 with 6 HR, 10 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against Los Angeles on 5/26/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1988, hitting .471 with 1 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Injured on 10/4/1988 with a Scratched Cornea Eye, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 10/16/1988 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Injured on 5/12/1990 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
